title: How to write an online dissertation proposal - Quora

response.answer_text: When you reach the point of writing a dissertation proposal, it’s clear that you’re almost finalizing the last stage of your education journey. The essence of this paper is to showcase your skills and capacity to research a chosen discipline. Below is a step by step process on how to write a dissertation proposal: 1. Choose a topic of interest, theme, and title Here, you need to state the problem you want to tackle, why you need to find a solution, how you’ll go about to get answers, and the general structure required. 2. Conduct effective research This is an essential stage that determines the overall development of the project. You need to make a timeline for research, find appropriate sources, and organize them. 3. Write the dissertation proposal Using the sources you get, write the first draft of the project. Ensure you have a plan to make it easier. The plan should state the basic outline that consists of an introduction, literature review, methodology, and bibliography. You also need another timeline for the writing process. 4. Edit and proofread your work After completing the first draft, don’t rush to edit your work. Take some time away from the project before you start editing. Ensure you proofread your work to catch all spelling mistakes, grammar, and other errors.  5. Get feedback Before you submit your dissertation, look for friends or colleagues with some knowledge in the discipline and ask about their suggestions and opinions for improvement. These are the top steps to help you write an online dissertation proposal.

If you’re getting it challenging to write a satisfactory proposal, some experts are ready to help. Make use of syllabus, and task management sheets. Using the task by task you can easily write online dissertation proposal.
